tool_description: Assigns backup equipment for critical photography gear, ensuring redundancy for essential functions during wedding events.

primary_equipment.description: List of primary equipment items with model numbers

backup_priority.description: Backup priority level (minimal, standard, critical, maximum)

error_messages: Empty primary equipment list: Provide at least one primary equipment item.
Invalid backup priority: Use minimal, standard, critical, or maximum.
Insufficient backup inventory: Not enough backup equipment available for the specified priority level.
usage: List your primary equipment and specify the backup priority level. The tool will assign appropriate backup equipment to ensure event continuity.

backup_assignments.description: Specific backup equipment assigned to each primary item

redundancy_level.description: Achieved redundancy level for the equipment setup

critical_gaps.description: Equipment categories lacking adequate backup coverage
